Why would Satella know about that!\""},{"lineNumber":155538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、完璧な作戦だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, a perfect plan!\""},{"lineNumber":155539,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――が、無駄になった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—but it was wasted."},{"lineNumber":155540,"originalJapaneseLine":"　つまらん」","translatedEnglishLine":"How boring.\""},{"lineNumber":155541,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬ、ぬおおお！　触手よ止さんか！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nn, nuooo! Tentacles, won’t you stop!?\""},{"lineNumber":155542,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぐっ、儂の体に絡みついて……！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh, they’re wrapping around my body...!?\""},{"lineNumber":155543,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぬああ、離せ！　離さんかぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nuaa, let go! Won’t let go!\""},{"lineNumber":155544,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、やめろ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, stop it!"},{"lineNumber":155545,"originalJapaneseLine":"　爺が絡まれてる姿を見ても","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing an old man being entangled"},{"lineNumber":155546,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちっとも嬉しくないわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"is not something that makes me happy at all!\""},{"lineNumber":155547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、いえいえ、儂もわざとでは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no, no, I didn’t do it on purpose...\""},{"lineNumber":155548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「将軍！　ランスさん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"General! Rance!\""},{"lineNumber":155549,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおっと、なんだぁ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, what is it?\""},{"lineNumber":155550,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時、スーがテント内に飛び込んできた。","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, Sue dashed into the tent."},{"lineNumber":155551,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well...\""},{"lineNumber":155552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お父様、なにを遊んでるのですか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Father, what are you playing at?\""},{"lineNumber":155553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬるぬる、どろどろ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Slippery, gooey?\""},{"lineNumber":155554,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ち、ちがっ！　これは……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"N-no! This is...!\""},{"lineNumber":155555,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わ、とととと……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"W-w-wait...!\""},{"lineNumber":155556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ご、ごほん。それより何があった？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-achoo. More importantly, what happened?\""},{"lineNumber":155557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい、そうでした。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes, that’s right."},{"lineNumber":155558,"originalJapaneseLine":"　たった今入った報告があります」","translatedEnglishLine":"I have a report that just came in.\""},{"lineNumber":155559,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔人シルキィがリーザス城付近に現れました！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The demon Silky has appeared near Leesas Castle!\""},{"lineNumber":155560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんじゃと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?\""},{"lineNumber":155561,"originalJapaneseLine":"スーの言葉にテント内の空気が","translatedEnglishLine":"At Sue's words, the atmosphere inside the tent"},{"lineNumber":155562,"originalJapaneseLine":"一気に引き締まる。","translatedEnglishLine":"tightened immediately."},{"lineNumber":155563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……詳しく聞かせろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Tell me the details.\""},{"lineNumber":155564,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人類軍と魔軍の戦闘が行われているのはここ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The battle between the human army and the demon army is taking place here."},{"lineNumber":155565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一方の魔人シルキィですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As for the demon Silky..."},{"lineNumber":155566,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おそらくこういうルートを通り、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She probably took this kind of route,"},{"lineNumber":155567,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一路リーザス城を目指したものと思われます」","translatedEnglishLine":"heading straight toward Leesas Castle.\""},{"lineNumber":155568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おそらく、現在はこの辺りかと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Most likely, she is around this area now.\""},{"lineNumber":155569,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂らをここに貼り付けた上で、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They pinned us down here,"},{"lineNumber":155570,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人による単身特攻を仕掛けるとは……","translatedEnglishLine":"then launched a solo demon suicide attack...\""},{"lineNumber":155571,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむふむ、シルキィめ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, Silky. To outsmart us like this,"},{"lineNumber":155572,"originalJapaneseLine":"　裏をかいてくるとはやるじゃないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"not bad at all.\""},{"lineNumber":155573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やられたな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We’ve been beaten..."},{"lineNumber":155574,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦場の後方は安全だった筈なのに……","translatedEnglishLine":"The rear of the battlefield was supposed to be safe..."},{"lineNumber":155575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス！　こうなったら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance! Now that it’s come to this...\""},{"lineNumber":155576,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言われるまでもない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You don’t have to say it."},{"lineNumber":155577,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様の狙いは最初からシルキィただ一人」","translatedEnglishLine":"My target has been Silky alone from the start.\""},{"lineNumber":155578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行くぞ、リーザス城だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's go, Leesas Castle!"},{"lineNumber":155579,"originalJapaneseLine":"　決着をつけてやる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll settle this once and for all!\""},{"lineNumber":155580,"originalJapaneseLine":"数十分前――","translatedEnglishLine":"Several tens of minutes earlier—"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「落とし穴ですかな？
魔人相手には効果が薄そうですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems to be ineffective against a demon, though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「中にこの触手生命体君を入れておく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Apparently, the plan was to put this tentacle creature inside,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という作戦を狙っていたらしい」
「どゅる、どゅるるるー♪」
ミラクルが手を振るうと、
召喚された触手生命体が現れた。
「ぬおおっ！　こ、これは奇っ怪な！」
「がははは！　こいつを落とし穴の中に入れて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahaha! Putting this guy inside the pit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落ちてきたシルキィを
触手責めでめろめろにする作戦だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is a plan to overwhelm her with tentacle torment!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「エロいことなら魔人相手でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We already know that if it's something erotic,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 効果があるのは既に分かっているからな」
「なあ、サテラ？」
「はあ？
「ば、馬鹿っ！　サテラが知るか、そんなこと！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-idiot! Why would Satella know about that!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、完璧な作戦だ！」
「――が、無駄になった。
つまらん」
「ぬ、ぬおおお！　触手よ止さんか！？
ぐっ、儂の体に絡みついて……！？
ぬああ、離せ！　離さんかぁ！」
「ええい、やめろ！
爺が絡まれてる姿を見ても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing an old man being entangled

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっとも嬉しくないわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is not something that makes me happy at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いえいえ、儂もわざとでは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no, no, I didn’t do it on purpose..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍！　ランスさん！」
「うおっと、なんだぁ？」
その時、スーがテント内に飛び込んできた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Sue dashed into the tent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが……」
「……お父様、なにを遊んでるのですか」
「ぬるぬる、どろどろ？」
「ち、ちがっ！　これは……！
わ、とととと……！」
「ご、ごほん。それより何があった？」
「は、はい、そうでした。
たった今入った報告があります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have a report that just came in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人シルキィがリーザス城付近に現れました！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The demon Silky has appeared near Leesas Castle!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんじゃと！？」
スーの言葉にテント内の空気が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Sue's words, the atmosphere inside the tent

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一気に引き締まる。
「……詳しく聞かせろ」
「人類軍と魔軍の戦闘が行われているのはここ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The battle between the human army and the demon army is taking place here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一方の魔人シルキィですが……」
「おそらくこういうルートを通り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "She probably took this kind of route,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一路リーザス城を目指したものと思われます」
「おそらく、現在はこの辺りかと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Most likely, she is around this area now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂らをここに貼り付けた上で、
魔人による単身特攻を仕掛けるとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then launched a solo demon suicide attack..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむふむ、シルキィめ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, Silky. To outsmart us like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏をかいてくるとはやるじゃないか」
「やられたな……
戦場の後方は安全だった筈なのに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The rear of the battlefield was supposed to be safe...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス！　こうなったら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance! Now that it’s come to this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言われるまでもない。
俺様の狙いは最初からシルキィただ一人」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My target has been Silky alone from the start."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「行くぞ、リーザス城だ！
決着をつけてやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll settle this once and for all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数十分前――

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

魔人による単身特攻を仕掛けるとは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then launched a solo demon suicide attack..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむふむ、シルキィめ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, Silky. To outsmart us like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏をかいてくるとはやるじゃないか」
「やられたな……
戦場の後方は安全だった筈なのに……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The rear of the battlefield was supposed to be safe...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス！　こうなったら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance! Now that it’s come to this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言われるまでもない。
俺様の狙いは最初からシルキィただ一人」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My target has been Silky alone from the start."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「行くぞ、リーザス城だ！
決着をつけてやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll settle this once and for all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数十分前――
